description: Les Cols Vert is an innovative association based in Paris focused on urban agriculture and food transition. The association is dedicated to urban agriculture and the food transition. It operates as a hybrid institution, combining elements of both a social enterprise and a network of independent associations. The initiative aims to support local authorities and educate citizens on sustainable practices, offering training, expertise, and services to promote urban farms and a comprehensive food transition across France.
name: Les Cols Vert
